GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object with the required properties

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, sorted by date descending

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given article_id, sorted by date descending

comments.body: I carry a log — yes. Is it funny to you? It is not to me.
comments.author: icellusedkars

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: request body accepts an object with username and body properties, adds a comment for a given article, and responds with the posted comment.

comment.body: I carry a log — yes. Is it funny to you? It is not to me.
comment.author: icellusedkars
